page.title: 12FARMS
page.content: The main "industry" in this area is {farming.}Many farms in the area keep {cows,}but they also grow crops such as {barley, wheat, vegetables and fruit. One of the farms in the area operates a{milk round}to supplement their income. { "Pick your own" soft fruit and {vegetables}is very popular. The farms grow crops such as{strawberries}and {raspberries;}when these have ripened the farmer advertises the fact so that the general public can come and pick the fruits that they want and then pay so much a pound_weight for the fruit that they have picked. Many farms have meadows which are cut for the annual{hay_making.
